contacts.error--add-contact: Unable to add contact. Please check your Internet connection.
contacts.error--add-contact-threema-id-already-ad: This Threema ID is already part of your contact list.
contacts.error--add-contact-threema-id-is-own: You cannot add your own Threema ID as a contact. Tip: For personal notes, you can create a group chat with you as the only member.
contacts.error--add-contact-threema-id-not-found: This Threema ID could not be found or has been revoked.
contacts.error--add-contact-threema-id-unable-to-: Couldn’t check if contact is valid. Is your device connected to the Internet?
contacts.hint--badge-consumer: This contact uses Threema’s consumer version.
contacts.hint--badge-work: This contact uses the business version Threema Work.
contacts.label--group-members-count-long: {n, plural, =0 {No Group Members} =1 {1 Group Member} other {# Group Members}}
contacts.prose--add-contact-instructions: Please enter the Threema ID of the contact you would like to add:
contacts.prose--add-contact-instructions-work-dir: Alternatively, search a contact in the company directory, and add it to your contact list:

dialog--app-update.markup--linux-p1: Please install the update through your system package manager or by running <1>flatpak update</1> in your terminal.
dialog--app-update.markup--linux-p2: For more information about this update, see <1 />.
dialog--app-update.markup--macos-p1: Please update by downloading and installing the latest release from <1 />.
dialog--app-update.markup--windows-p1: Please update by downloading and installing the latest release from <1 />.
dialog--app-update.prose--intro: An update for Threema is available!

dialog--change-password.error--new-password-must-be-different: The new password must be different from the old one
dialog--change-password.error--password-length: Please enter at least {n, plural, =1 {1 character} other {# characters}}
dialog--change-password.prose--intro: The password protects your messages, Threema ID, and other data on this computer. You have to enter it when opening Threema for desktop. Please note that there is no way to recover this password. If you forget it, you will have to link this device again.

dialog--delete-contact.prose--prompt: Do you really want to delete this contact and the corresponding chat?

dialog--empty-conversation.prose--contact-conversation-prompt: This will delete {n, plural, =1 {the only message} other {all # messages}} in this chat with {name} on this device (but not on your linked devices).
dialog--empty-conversation.prose--distribution-list-conversation-pr: This will delete {n, plural, =1 {the only message} other {all # messages}} in the “{name}” distribution list on this device (but not on your linked devices).
dialog--empty-conversation.prose--group-conversation-prompt: This will delete the {n, plural, =1 {the only message} other {all # messages}} in the “{name}” group chat on this device (but not on your linked devices).

dialog--error-connection.action--client-was-dropped-confirm: Remove Local Profile and Relink Device
dialog--error-connection.markup--client-update-required-p1: This Threema version is no longer supported (outdated protocol version).
dialog--error-connection.markup--client-update-required-p2: Please <1>update to the latest version</1> to continue using Threema.
dialog--error-connection.markup--client-was-dropped-p1: This device has been unlinked, which is why you currently can’t send or receive new messages.
dialog--error-connection.markup--client-was-dropped-p2: If unlinking was not triggered by you, please note that this might happen during the beta phase for technical reasons. We apologize for the inconvience.
dialog--error-connection.markup--client-was-dropped-p3: For more information, see <1>this FAQ entry</1>.
dialog--error-connection.prose--mediator-update-required-p1: This Threema version is not compatible with your mediator server. The server uses an outdated protocol version and must be updated first.
dialog--error-connection.prose--mediator-update-required-p2: Please contact your Threema server administrator.

dialog--error-delete-contact.error--is-group-member: “{name}” is still member of a group. Remove the contact from the group or delete the group.

dialog--id-information.prose--threema-id-description-p1: When starting the app for the first time, each Threema user gets a randomly generated 8-digit Threema ID. This ID is your unique address in Threema and makes it possible to use Threema completely anonymously, i.e., without having to disclose any personal information.
dialog--id-information.prose--threema-id-description-p2: Your Threema ID is just one of two components that make up your identity in Threema. The other one is the so-called key pair (consisting of a public key and a private key) which is essential for the encryption. Your Threema ID is permanently tied to your public key. While the public key is sent to Threema’s servers to be distributed to your chat partners, the private key remains on your device, where it is securely stored. All messages directed to you will be individually encrypted with your public key on the sender’s device and can only be decrypted with your personal private key.

dialog--linking-confirm-emoji.label--title: Confirm Images on Your Mobile Device

dialog--linking-error.label--message-connection-error-timeout: Due to inactivity, the linking process was terminated. Please start the process again.
dialog--linking-error.label--message-rendezvous-error-timeout: Due to inactivity, the linking process was terminated. Please start the process again.
dialog--linking-error.label--message-restore-error: There was an error restoring the transferred data. Please try again.
dialog--linking-error.label--title-invalid-work-credentials: Invalid or Expired Threema Work License
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-connection-error-generic: Connection to the server was lost before linking was complete. If you did not abort the process yourself, please check your Internet connection, and try again.
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-generic: An error occurred during linking. Please try again.
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-invalid-identity: The Threema ID used for linking is unknown to the server or has been revoked.
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-invalid-work-credentials: The license for Threema Work is invalid or has expired.
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-wrong-app-variant-consume: It is not possible to link your Threema ID with this app. If you use Threema Work on your mobile device, download the desktop app from <1 />.
dialog--linking-error.prose--message-wrong-app-variant-work-er: It is not possible to link your Threema ID with this app. If you use the consumer version of Threema on your mobile device, download the desktop app from <1 />.

dialog--linking-scan.markup--intro: This beta version can be used in connection with {threema} for iOS. Please note that some features are not yet available. <1>Learn more</1>
dialog--linking-scan.markup--step-1: Open the {threema} app on your mobile device
dialog--linking-scan.markup--step-2: In the app, go to “<1>Settings</1> > <1>Desktop/Web</1> > <1>Linked Device</1>,” and tap “<1>Add Device</1>”

dialog--linking-set-password.error--password-length: Please enter at least {n, plural, =1 {1 character} other {# characters}}
dialog--linking-set-password.prose--intro: The password will protect your messages, Threema ID, and other data on this computer. You have to enter it when starting the desktop app.

dialog--linking-success.markup--description-consumer: Threema can now be used on this computer <1/>(even when your iOS device is turned off or isn’t connected to the Internet).
dialog--linking-success.markup--description-work: Threema Work can now be used on this computer <1/>(even when your iOS device is turned off or isn’t connected to the Internet).

dialog--startup-unlock.error--incorrect-password: The entered password is incorrect. Please try again.
dialog--startup-unlock.markup--password-hint: Forgot password? Please consult <1>this FAQ entry</1>.

dialog--unrecoverable-state.prose--description-p1: We have detected that your local data is in an unrecoverable state. To prevent data loss, you currently can’t send or receive new messages. We apologize for the inconvience.
dialog--unrecoverable-state.prose--description-p2: To continue using Threema, you need to remove your local profile and relink the device.
dialog--unrecoverable-state.prose--description-p3: Please report this error to Threema’s support from the app on your mobile device (“Settings > Beta Feedback”). Note: Remember to save your logs before relinking, as they will be cleared.

dialog--unsupported-feature-protected-co.prose--description: Private chats are not yet supported in {appName}.

dialog--verification-levels.prose--intro: The dots are an indicator for a contact’s verification level.
dialog--verification-levels.prose--level-fully-verified-default: You have personally verified the ID and public key of the person by scanning their QR code. Assuming their device has not been hijacked, you can be very sure that messages from this contact were really written by the person that they indicate.
dialog--verification-levels.prose--level-fully-verified-work: This verification level is only available in Threema Work; it indicates that the Threema ID belongs to an internal contact whose ID and public key you have verified by scanning their QR code.
dialog--verification-levels.prose--level-server-verified-default: The ID has been matched with a contact in your address book (by phone number or email). Since the server verifies phone numbers and email addresses, you can be reasonably sure that the person is who they claim to be.
dialog--verification-levels.prose--level-server-verified-work: This verification level is only available in Threema Work; it indicates that the Threema ID belongs to an internal company contact.
dialog--verification-levels.prose--level-unverified: The ID and public key have been obtained from the server because you received a message from this contact for the first time or added the ID manually. No matching contact was found in your address book (by phone number or email), and therefore you cannot be sure that the person is who they claim to be in their messages.

messaging.error--contact-blocked: You cannot send a message to this contact because it is blocked.
messaging.error--contact-invalid: You cannot send a message to this contact because it is invalid.
messaging.error--copy-message-content: Could not copy message to clipboard
messaging.error--copy-message-image: Could not copy image to clipboard
messaging.error--copy-message-link: Could not copy link to clipboard
messaging.error--copy-message-selection: Could not copy selection to clipboard
messaging.error--file-internal-error: Data could not be loaded due to an internal error.
messaging.error--file-permanent-download-error: Data could not be downloaded, the download expired.
messaging.error--file-storage-read-error: Could not read data from file storage.
messaging.error--file-storage-write-error: Downloaded data could not be stored in file storage. Do you have enough free disk space?
messaging.error--file-temporary-download-error: Download failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
messaging.error--group-membership: You are no longer part of this group.
messaging.error--quoted-message-not-found: The quoted message could not be found.
messaging.markup--chat-empty-state: This chat is linked with your mobile device. <1/>All future messages will appear here.

system.error--connection: No server connection. Try reconnecting to Wi-Fi, or check your modem and router.
system.error--connection-unrecoverable-state: This device was disconnected from the server due to an unexpected error. Please restart the app, and relink the device.
